parameter.name: robotType
parameter.label: Robot Type
parameter.description: The Type of the robot (turtlebot, nao, youbot)

parameter.name: robotHost
parameter.label: Robot Host
parameter.description: The host address for the ROS

channel-type.label: Set Location
channel-type.description: Sets the current position of the robot(at start, the robot wont know, where it is).

channel-type.label: Move to
channel-type.description: Move the robot to the given location

channel-type.label: Movement State
channel-type.description: State if the robot is moving or reached his location

channel-type.label: Current Location
channel-type.description: Current Location of the robot. You can also set the position (P: 12,12 11,12 O: 10,23 0,8)

channel-type.label: Stop Movement
channel-type.description: Cancel all currently active move operations and come to a halt.

channel-type.label: Simple Location
channel-type.description: A simple current location of the robot. Better for comparison
